Verses: 1 paralogaththil Vaasamaayirukkiravare, Ummidaththirku En Kangalai Eredukkiren.

2 idho, Velaikkaararin Kangal Thangal Ejamaangalin Kaiyai Nokkiyirukkumaappolavum, Velaikkaariyin Kangal Than Ejamaattiyin Kaiyai Nokkiyirukkumaappolavum, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engalukku Irakkanseyyumvaraikkum, Engal Kangal Avarai Nokkiyirukkiradhu.
3 engalukku Irangum Karththaave, Engalukku Irangum; Nindhanaiyinaal Migavum Niraindhirukkirom.
4 sugajeevigaludaiya Nindhanaiyinaalum, Agangaarigaludaiya Igazhchchiyinaalum, Engal Aaththumaa Migavum Niraindhirukkiradhu.
